blogPost.title: Is it actually a good time to sell a car and buy a new one? Gurpreet Singh, General Manager of Auto Loans at @creditkarma, shares his expert advice. https://t.co/7KJh0Zo36u https://t.co/G82pDCmOiu
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 実は、車を売って新しい車を買うのは良いタイミングなのか？Gurpreet Singh, General Manager of Auto Loans at @creditkarma, shares his expert advice. https://t.co/7KJh0Zo36u https://t.co/G82pDCmOiu
现在其实是卖车买新车的好时机吗？@creditkarma的汽车贷款总经理Gurpreet Singh分享了他的专业建议。https://t.co/7KJh0Zo36u https://t.co/G82pDCmOiu
現在其實是賣車買新車的好時機嗎？@creditkarma的汽車貸款總經理Gurpreet Singh分享了他的專業建議。https://t.co/7KJh0Zo36u https://t.co/G82pDCmOiu

previous.title: Want another take on how to keep customers happy? Check out this piece by Joel McKelvey, VP of Product and Partner Marketing at @sisudata. https://t.co/VqCDWqtJ9G https://t.co/cmfpLTIWt1

localize.full_text: 顧客を満足させるためのもう一つの方法とは？sisudata の製品およびパートナーマーケティング担当副社長、Joel McKelvey 氏の記事をご覧ください。https://t.co/VqCDWqtJ9G https://t.co/cmfpLTIWt1
想知道如何让客户满意的另一种看法吗？请看@sisudata的产品和合作伙伴营销副总裁Joel McKelvey的文章。https://t.co/VqCDWqtJ9G https://t.co/cmfpLTIWt1
想知道如何讓客戶滿意的另一種看法嗎？請看@sisudata的產品和合作夥伴營銷副總裁Joel McKelvey的文章。https://t.co/VqCDWqtJ9G https://t.co/cmfpLTIWt1
